name: Santa Rosa CityBus
description: Free rides for youth, children, veterans, SRJC students, some city/county workers
fullDescription: Santa Rosa CityBus provides local public transit service throughout the City of Santa Rosa in Sonoma County, with multiple routes connecting neighborhoods, schools, shopping, and employment centers.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free rides for youth 18 and under
- Free rides for children with paying adult
- Free rides for veterans with valid ID
- Free rides for SRJC students with student ID
- Free rides for some city and county workers
howToGetIt:
1. Youth: Show ID proving age 18 or under
2. Veterans: Show valid military or VA ID
3. SRJC Students: Show current student ID
4. City/County Workers: Show employee ID (if eligible)
5. No separate application neededâ€”just show ID when boarding
